issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When I use *"Distribute - Apple app store"* button, I got a
{quote}[ERROR] :Invalid "--distribution-name" value "XXXXXXXXXXX "{quote}

I think this occurs because the distribution name have a special character {color:red}*ยบ*{color} in the name of the distribution certificate

If I use Titanium SDK 3.3.0 GA for distribution there is no error.
fields.summary: Cannot Publish and Distribute in Apple iTunes Store
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409261227
Ti Mobile SDK 3.2.3.GA
Xcode: 5.1.1
OS X 10.9.5

comments.body: Hello, [~webcmfmaster] Try Upgrading your Titanium SDK to 3.4.0.GA and CLI 3.4.0, as you are using studio version 3.4.0.201409261227. Thanks.

Hello, Amimul, I have all the updates. But I need to build and distribute one project with SDK 3.2.3.GA. Build ends correctly but distribution fails with the message ERROR :Invalid "--distribution-name". If I use SDK 3.3.0 GA or 3.4.0 for distribution there is no error, but I need 3.2.3 GA for compatibility. Thanks.

Hello [~webcmfmaster], 

If is fixed in 3.4.0. The workaround should be open the xcode project and distribute within it. 

Best Regards,
Mauro
